H0.text: Norovirus causes illness in humans described by what body part. Stomach

H1.text: Norovirus causes illness in humans described by what body part. Intestine

H2.text: Norovirus causes illness in humans described by what body part. Liver

H3.text: Norovirus causes illness in humans described by what body part. Cardia

A4.text: The virus replicates within the small intestine.

A5.text: Norovirus infection is characterized by nausea, vomiting, watery diarrhea, abdominal pain, and in some cases, loss of taste.
